name: Abscent VR - Throwing game (HTC Vive)
description:
WindowsNoEditor.zip - packaged game

AbscentVR_packed.zip - unreal project

Testing out HTC Vive in Unreal Engine 4, created with Blueprints

Can grab, activate/deactivate gravity, pull objects towards you and throw

Goal is to get enough objects in the basket to move on to next level.

Created for HTC Vive

Solo project by: Adrian Lervåg Skår
